argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | indlcim.f | |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) |
| 2 |  | indlcim.b | |- B = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | indlcim.c | |- C = ( Base ` T ) |
| 4 |  | indlcim.v | |- .x. = ( .s ` T ) |
| 5 |  | indlcim.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` T ) |
| 6 |  | indlcim.e | |- E = ( x e. B |-> ( T gsum ( x oF .x. A ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | indlcim.t | |- ( ph -> T e. LMod ) |
| 8 |  | indlcim.i | |- ( ph -> I e. X ) |
| 9 |  | indlcim.r | |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` T ) ) |
| 10 |  | indlcim.a | |- ( ph -> A : I -onto-> J ) |
| 11 |  | indlcim.l | |- ( ph -> A LIndF T ) |
| 12 |  | indlcim.s | |- ( ph -> ( N ` J ) = C ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fofn | |- ( A : I -onto-> J -> A Fn I ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> A Fn I ) |
| 15 | 3 | #P_lindff | |- ( ( A LIndF T /\ T e. LMod ) -> A : dom A --> C ) |
| 16 | 11, 7, 15 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> A : dom A --> C ) |
| 17 |  | #P_frn | |- ( A : dom A --> C -> ran A C_ C ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ran A C_ C ) |
| 19 |  | #P_df-f | |- ( A : I --> C <-> ( A Fn I /\ ran A C_ C ) ) |
| 20 | 14, 18, 19 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> A : I --> C ) |
| 21 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 20 | #P_frlmup1 | |- ( ph -> E e. ( F LMHom T ) ) |
| 22 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 20 | #P_islindf5 | |- ( ph -> ( A LIndF T <-> E : B -1-1-> C ) ) |
| 23 | 11, 22 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> E : B -1-1-> C ) |
| 24 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 20, 5 | #P_frlmup3 | |- ( ph -> ran E = ( N ` ran A ) ) |
| 25 |  | #P_forn | |- ( A : I -onto-> J -> ran A = J ) |
| 26 | 10, 25 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ran A = J ) |
| 27 | 26 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( N ` ran A ) = ( N ` J ) ) |
| 28 | 24, 27, 12 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ran E = C ) |
| 29 |  | #P_dff1o5 | |- ( E : B -1-1-onto-> C <-> ( E : B -1-1-> C /\ ran E = C ) ) |
| 30 | 23, 28, 29 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> E : B -1-1-onto-> C ) |
| 31 | 2, 3 | #P_islmim | |- ( E e. ( F LMIso T ) <-> ( E e. ( F LMHom T ) /\ E : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
| 32 | 21, 30, 31 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> E e. ( F LMIso T ) ) |
